SELECT T1.CCODE, T1.CCODENAME FROM sy_ccodemst T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.CCODENAME LIKE '%$CCODENAME$%'
ORDER BY T1.CCODE ASC

SELECT T1.DCODE, T1.DCODENAME, T1.USEYN, T1.SORTKEY, T1.REMARK, T1.AUX1, T1.AUX1DESC, T1.AUX2, T1.AUX2DESC, T1.AUX3, T1.AUX3DESC, T1.AUX4, T1.AUX4DESC FROM sy_ccodedtl T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.CCODE = #CCODE#
ORDER BY T1.DCODE ASC, T1.SORTKEY
